enhanced_description: AST Consultancy Services, established in 2013 by Dinesh Arya and Dushyant Arya, leverages over 55 years of combined expertise to serve as a trusted partner in executive search. Specializing in the successful placement of passive talent in senior and pivotal roles, the firm collaborates with leading Indian, private, and multinational brands across India and the EMEA region. Their unique headhunting methodology, which blends science and art, rigorously prioritizes functional, behavioral, and cultural fit. Committed to diligence, integrity, and aligning company values, ASTC ensures optimal matches for both employers and candidates. Clients benefit from fast-track shortlisting within 5 weeks, flexible hybrid payment terms (a mix of upfront and performance-based), and direct founder support for the initial six months, enhancing client confidence and ensuring efficient talent acquisition.
